shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.

section.p: This method controls whether to publish the locally captured video stream. If the local video stream is not published, the video capture device is not disabled, so the video capture state is not affected. Compared with calling enableLocalVideo(false) to stop local video capture and thus cancel publishing, this method responds faster.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured video stream. Not publishing the local video stream does not disable the video capturing device, so it does not affect the video capture status. Compared to calling enableLocalVideo(false) to disable video capture and thus stop publishing the local video stream, this method responds faster.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured video stream. Not publishing the local video stream does not disable the video capture device, so it does not affect the video capture status. Compared to calling enableLocalVideo(false) to stop video capture and thus stop publishing, this method responds faster.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured video stream. Not publishing the local video stream does not disable the video capture device, so it does not affect the video capture status. Compared to calling EnableLocalVideo(false) to stop local video capture and thus stop publishing, this method responds faster.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining the channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the local client triggers the callback; the remote client triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback; the remote user triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is called successfully, the local user receives the callback; remote users receive the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback; remote users trigger the and callbacks.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop sending the local video stream.
: Stop sending the local video stream.
: (Default) Send the local video stream.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
